MooseX::Getopt::Meta::Attribute::Trait::NoGetopt(3pm) User Contributed Perl Documentation MooseX::Getopt::Meta::Attribute::Trait::NoGetopt(3pm)

NAME

MooseX::Getopt::Meta::Attribute::Trait::NoGetopt - Optional meta attribute trait for ignoring parameters

VERSION

version 0.59

SYNOPSIS

  package App;
  use Moose;

  with 'MooseX::Getopt';

  has 'data' => (
      traits  => [ 'NoGetopt' ],  # do not attempt to capture this param
      is      => 'ro',
      isa     => 'Str',
      default => 'file.dat',
  );

DESCRIPTION

This is a custom attribute metaclass trait which can be used to specify that a specific attribute should not be processed by "MooseX::Getopt". All you need to do is specify the "NoGetopt" metaclass trait. 

  has 'foo' => (traits => [ 'NoGetopt', ... ], ... );
